title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7850.1 - Weekends and holidays
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7850.1 - Weekends and holidays

State Regulations

Whenever a date specified in this Chapter for the doing
of any act falls on a weekend or a public holiday, such act shall be required
to take place on the following business day. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7850.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
